line.text: %PROFX%I am sorry but I must insist you finish your mission in the Jungle Canal before you venture into other areas of the Savage Land. We must determine if Mystique is safe . . . and if she is safe, why she ran off into the jungle.
%PLAYER%Sorry, Professor Xavier. I almost forgot. I'll return to the Jungle Canal soon.
line.textb: %PLAYER%Yes, yes. As you wish Xavier. But I wonder which it is your more interested in; if Mystique is safe or if she's planning something?
